main event: A civilian observer reported a sighting of a round, bright white light moving across the sky for 75 minutes on June 2, 1962.
interesting points: The sighting occurred in dark, clear weather conditions., The object was observed to have slight maneuvering., The light was about the size of a basketball and appeared one mile high., The observer initially thought it was a balloon but noted it could not be adequately explained., The object was heading south against the wind direction.
